casebody.data:
MITCHELL, Respondent, v. O’REILLY, SKELLY & FOGARTY CO., Appellant. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. February 16, 1894.) Action by Samuel M. Mitchell against O’Reilly, Skelly & .Fogarty Company.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. X, and O’BRIEN and FOLLETT, JJ.

E. W. S, Johnson, for appellant. G. W. Blunt, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.'
